techmeme.title: FTC bans location data providers Gravy and subsidiary Venntel as well as Mobilewalla from using or selling data related to sensitive locations and more (Joseph Cox/404 Media)
Sources: Intel starts shortlisting a handful of CEO candidates, including former board member Lip-Bu Tan, who left in August 2024 after clashing with Gelsinger (Milana Vinn/Reuters)
Generative AI startup Yurts, which has contracts with the US Army, Air Force, and others, raised a $40M Series B led by XYZ, taking its total raised to $58.35M (Margaux MacColl/TechCrunch)
TikTok says it removed a network covertly campaigning for Calin Georgescu, whose shock victory in Romania's November 24 election threw the country into crisis (Gian Volpicelli/Bloomberg)
Nick Clegg says Mark Zuckerberg is keen to play "an active role" in Trump admin tech policy debates and Meta "overdid it a bit" when moderating pandemic content (Hannah Murphy/Financial Times)
